sentences.en: By 2000 rail accounted for just 1 % of all intercity commercial trips.
sentences.cn: 2000年,在所有城市间旅行中,铁路仅占有1%分额.
你们提供城市间的送货 吗 ?

sentences.en: In contrast to similar services in France and Germany, Intercity rolling stock is very rarely idle.
sentences.cn: 与法国和德国的类似铁路服务系统不同，“城际列车”很少闲置。

sentences.en: Intercity bus travel has taken off in the last few years.
sentences.cn: 长途客车旅行在最近的几年里深受欢迎.

sentences.en: Intercity reap substantial profits, attracting a lot of Shanxi Zou Xikou.
sentences.cn: 互市获利甚丰, 吸引了许多山西人走西口.

sentences.en: Qingdao to Rongcheng inter - city rail traffic, referred to as " Green intercity railway. "
sentences.cn: 青岛至荣成城际轨道交通, 简称 “ 青荣城际铁路 ”.

sentences.en: The network is already creating a new class of intercity commuters.
sentences.cn: 铁路网已经创造了城市间全新的交通类别.

trans.tran_en: happening between two or more cities, or going from one city to another
